author: Staff Reporter
text:
A five-year-old girl of Sekudanthali near Somanur who suffered burns near her house on January 26 died at the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Saturday. The police said that the girl was playing by setting fire on wastes close to her house when flames spread on her clothes.

House burgled

Unidentified burglars broke into a house at S.S. Nagar in Appanaickenpalayam near Thudiyalur in the wee hours of Sunday and fled with Rs. 1.75 lakh, around 15 sovereigns gold jewellery, a LED television and a few silver articles.
title: Girl succumbs to burns
